home_description: 3rd year Computer Science student, DACS path. Passionate about automation, deployment and infrastructure security.
about_bio_text: Currently in my 3rd year of a Computer Science degree, specializing in DACS (Deployment of Communicating and Secure Applications), I focus on system and network administration, virtualization, and infrastructure security. My goal is to ensure the availability, performance, and security of applications.
about_internship_desc: Final year internship in SysAdmin / Network / Virtualization.
modal_internship_mobility_desc:
I am actively looking in Luxembourg, as well as in the Longwy, Metz, and Nancy areas.
Driver's license and personal vehicle.
modal_internship_mission_1: Administration and maintenance of Linux/Windows servers
modal_internship_mission_4: Configuration of network and security equipment
poste_desc: Mail sorting using automated equipment or manually. Weekend student job.
crous_desc: Responsible for welcoming, integrating, and supporting student residents. Organizing events and managing daily issues.
ela_desc: Development of VBA solutions for data management from a CRM. Workflow optimization and technical support.
ela_details_intro: Review of my 8-week internship at the ELA Association, focused on automating business tools with VBA and Excel.

ela_details_highlight_2: Dynamic generation of CERFA forms and administrative documents
ela_details_highlight_3: Cleaning and optimization of large Excel workbooks
ela_details_highlight_4: Clear documentation to ensure tool continuity
iss_desc: Cleaning and maintenance of railway infrastructure during the summer periods.
but_desc: Linux Administration, Virtualization (Docker), Cloud, Security, Network Administration, Programming (Java, C, JS, PHP...).
polytech_desc: Training in engineering sciences, mathematics, electrical circuits, and use of CATIA V5 software.
bac_desc: Specialties: Mathematics, Engineering Sciences, and Physics.

skills_vut_5_comment: Project tracking with Git, Agile methods, and regular deliverables.
skills_vut_6_comment: Using GitHub in a team, continuous integration (GitHub Actions), and deployment on Linux servers.
